lead_paragraph: WEINTRAUB--Selma, passed away on March 8th, 10 days short of her 100th birthday. She is survived by her children, Myra Perlen and Jeff Weintraub and their spouses, Stuart Perlen and Ingerid Weintraub. She will be dearly missed by her grandchildren Melissa, Rick, Heidi and Sara as well as her great- grandchildren Colette, Giselle, Chase, Chloe, Olivia, Luke, Ethan, Sophie and Julie. Services will be graveside on Thursday, March 10th at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY. 1/3
